plot: An alchemist falls in love with the mysterious "La Femme Enredadera" (The Vine-Woman) in an exotic bar. They have a child, whose curiosity for his father's experiments brings tragedy.
title: Opus nigrum
plot_es: An alchemist falls in love with the mysterious "La Femme Enredadera" (The Vine-Woman) in an exotic bar. They have a child, whose curiosity for his father's experiments brings tragedy.

produce.name: Escuela Internacional de Cine y Televisión (EICTV)
